Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Montreal in 2019...
Traded from Montreal to New York on 3/2/2019 (Going to NY: C Steven Winer. Going to MON: 3B Kenneth Cook)...
Injured on 8/16/2019 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2 weeks...

Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2022, off Rodney Schloss (CIN)...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
